testsuite.name: megastores.Change_Email
testsuite.system-out: Login clicked Username added Password added Submit clicked Login successfull My Account Clicked successfully Test Passed: User has been directed to change password screen successfully

Test Passed: Not allowing the user to change email if it already exist
Test passed : Got message that the verification link is sent and also changed email is displayed in email text field
